yeah i just used presets so all 4 in the example would be the same. you're setting the intensity of each color, like a tv pixel. so if you want yellow add red+green, the closer all 3 colors are the closer the light will be to white. set all 3 to 20% and it'll be white dimmed to 20%..

Is it possible to disable the light color dialog in the VAB? everytime i use the right mouse button-drag to change the view and move over the light collider, this dialog pops up, and is very difficult to close without clicking through the dialog and accidentally picking up ship parts. Why is this dialog enabled in the VAB anyway? The light doesnt work there. Please, give me an option/cfg switch to disable that behaviour, its driving me crazy (but i want to keep this mod)

I enabled the GUI in the editor because it lets you save the colours in the .craft file - so if you for example have aircraft lights, you could set them to the right colour once instead of doing it every time you launch the plane.

I just released an update where I changed it from the right mouse button to the light action group key (should be U by default), so no more annoying popups when just moving the camera. You can get it from the usual place.
